formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'FIELDQTY' =-
[Syntax] FIELDQTY(<varname>|<delim>)
[Synopsis] Count the fields, with an arbitrary delimiter
[Description] Not available

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -1,7 +1,7 @@ -= Info about function 'FIELDQTY' =-
[Syntax] - FIELDQTY(<varname>,<delim>) + FIELDQTY(<varname>|<delim>)
[Synopsis] Count the fields, with an arbitrary delimiter

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,7 +1,7 @@ -= Info about function 'FIELDQTY' =-
[Syntax] - FIELDQTY(<varname>|<delim>) + FIELDQTY(<varname>,<delim>)
[Synopsis] Count the fields, with an arbitrary delimiter
